    • setAllianceColor

      private static void setAllianceColor​(int allianceNum, java.util.ArrayList<Drone> soldiers)
      setAllianceColor() assigns the colors of the alliance to all warriors in that alliance
      Parameters:
      allianceNum - the selected alliance between 0 and 3 (max of 4 armies)
      soldiers - the soldiers of the army to have their color set

      max - the maximum number to have the range bounded by

      the generated random number
